description.ko: 식물 생태계와 첨단 컴퓨팅이 결합된 FLORA-9 프로젝트의 선구적인 표현입니다. 이 이미지는 합성 에너지와 데이터 기반 진화로 구동되는 유기적 구조를 보여주며 '디지털 네이처'의 본질을 담아냅니다.
description.en: A visionary representation of the FLORA-9 project, where botanical life and advanced computing merge. This visual captures the essence of Digital Nature, showcasing organic structures powered by synthetic energy and data-driven evolution.

prompt: Hyper-realistic cinematic close-up of a FLORA-9 specimen, a bioluminescent flower with translucent petals containing visible microchip patterns and fiber-optic veins. The core pulses with a soft blue neon light. Background features a blurred digital forest with floating binary particles and shimmering holographic leaves. 8k resolution, ray tracing, cyberpunk aesthetic, macro photography, organic-digital fusion.
